title: Triple Threat
desc:
Post 1946
- If a player can't play a card on this, the following 3 effects occur to them:
 - ( <:brown:1107516362903007232> ) Draw 2 cards and choose someone's turn to be skipped.
 - ( <:lightblue:1120572625865949194> ) Have a card in their hand converted into <:blue:1106234079055200378> or <:white:1107514189574045726>, then have their turn skipped.
 - ( <:white:1107514189574045726> ) Have their next turn skipped.
